title: Weekly Wrap: GDP and Greece
contenttemplated:
[{"content":"

 Catherine Rampell from the Washington Post and Fusion's' Felix Salmon join Kai to talk about the week's business and economic news. The big topics this week: GDP, consumer spending, Greece's financial situation and the country's relationship with the eurozone. 

","type":"text/html"}]
contentencoded: Catherine Rampell from the Washington Post and Fusion's' Felix Salmon join Kai to talk about the week's business and economic news. The big topics this week: GDP, consumer spending, Greece's financial situation and the country's relationship with the eurozone.
teaser: Catherine Rampell and Felix Salmon join Kai Ryssdal to recap the week in business and finance.
description: Catherine Rampell and Felix Salmon join Kai Ryssdal to recap the week in business and finance.
